01-basic-anchor.title: Basic Anchor
01-basic-anchor.description: A simple anchor component with custom underline. Hover to see the popover preview.

02-anchor-with-preview.title: Anchor with Rich Preview
02-anchor-with-preview.description: Anchor component displaying a richer preview content on hover.
